title: 3 vs. 3 Twisted Cup #1 40.000 RP powered by LC-Power
body:
Seid ihr bereit für unser neues 3 vs. 3 Twisted Turnier?

*Wann?* 27.05.2015 18:30 Uhr
*Preise?* 
1. 5x 3200 RP + Turnier Skin
2. 5x 2400 RP
3. 5x 1600 RP
4. 5x 800 RP
*Modus?* 3 vs. 3 Gewundener Wald
*Wo?* [Turnierseite](http://escene.de/pages,610.html)
*In welcher Sprache?*  Englisch, aber alle Admins sind Deutsch, also ist Deutsch kein Problem
> Tournament procedure: The bracket with the matches will be released at 18:30 CET. You can contact your opponents by adding the team captain via his Summoner name or by contacting your opponent via IRC channel #escene. You can find the Summoner names at the participants list. The matches are played via a custom game which one of the participants has to create. The result must be submitted via the "Submit result" button. Screenshots have to be taken by the winner team. You will only need to submit them if there are any issues.

Wenn ihr irgendwelche Fragen habt added mich in LoL oder schreibt mir eine e-mail an mm@escene.de.

Lg,
Mr Poke

replies.body: Auf der Turnierseite steht 5v5 Aram und Battle of the Bridge #18. Was ist es nun genau?
